alert.note: Alert for Dillon; Florence; Marion (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 04 at 2:35PM EDT until August 04 at 3:30PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: The National Weather Service in Wilmington has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... North central Florence County in northeastern South Carolina... Southwestern Dillon County in northeastern South Carolina... Northwestern Marion County in northeastern South Carolina... * Until 330 PM EDT. * At 234 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Blue Brick, or 7 miles southwest of Marion, moving north at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect wind damage to trees and power lines. * Locations impacted include... Marion, Dillon, Latta, Sellers, Floydale, Blue Brick, Oak Grove and Mcleod Medical Center. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
